snippet: Jessica Seinfeld, in running her charity, Baby Buggy, which provides baby clothing, gear and services to families in need, has had to surmount the fact that her husband is Jerry.
abstract: Jessica Seinfeld, wife of comedian Jerry Seinfeld, runs charity called Baby Buggy, which provides baby clothing, gear and services to families in need; she says she has had to struggle to get people to take her seriously because they usually assume it is a vanity project.
lead_paragraph: Jessica Seinfeld, in running her charity, Baby Buggy, which provides baby clothing, gear and services to families in need, has had to surmount the fact that her husband is Jerry.

headline.main: Her Name Is Famous, but She’s Not About Nothing
headline.print_headline: Her Name Is Famous, but She’s Not About Nothing
